description: In the hidden object game "Hidden World of Art 2" you have to restore real classical paintings by finding hidden items and solving puzzles!

name: Space electrician
description: Space electrician is a classic falcon in a space setting

name: Carnival Hunt
description: Carnival Hunt is a Multiplayer Social Horror Game where you can either fight against the cannibalism corrupting the world or embrace it. Will you be the first one to commit cannibalism for survival or test your instinct at trust?

name: Jetboard Joust
description:
Classic arcade-style SHMUP meets hardcore modern roguelike! Take flight on a lethal, pimped-up jetboard, darting through the skies and blasting alien invaders with an explosive arsenal of extreme weaponry. Face off against massive, multi-stage bosses as you protect innocent civilians from being abducted and turned into mutants. An arcade classic for the next generation!

Jetboard Joust blends the spirit and intensity of 1980s arcade coin-op SMHUPs with the replayability and tactical elements of hardcore modern roguelikes. Don't expect a story. Do expect frantic, fluid, fast-paced 60fps action, big guns, and explosions!

The Jetboard: Leap from your jetboard like a boss to gain temporary invincibility and smash your enemies to smithereens. Destroy pretty much everything in your path. You rock.

The Enemies: Over fifty different enemies to outwit. Be prepared for them to come at you with all the game's weapons plus their own special attacks. Watch out for a few tributes to classic arcade games of the past too...

The Weapons: From the conventional to the ridiculous! Jetboard Joust offers over thirty powerful weapons, each with its own distinct advantages and upgrade path, to aid you on your mission and leave a path of total destruction in your wake. Get up close and dish out massive damage with the shotgun, wreak havoc with the cluster bomb, fry enemies to a crisp with the flame tornado or shock them into submission with the lightning bolt. You'll get a different selection of weapons with each playthrough and you'll need to master them all!

The Bosses: Defeat huge bosses in a series of grueling multi-stage battles and then steal their attacks for your own use. Rendered in exquisite pixel-art detail, these guys will test your weapon-handling and evasive maneuvering to their limits.

The Planets: Choose your own path through a multitude of battlegrounds across the surface of five different planets. Discover hidden treasure, upgrades and awesome new weapons. Adapt your route based on your playstyle, the weapons you unlock and the treasure you discover. Plunder cash from fallen enemies and use it to pimp up your jetboard, jetsuit and max out your weapons for a formidable arsenal. Are you up to the challenge?

name: Labirint
description: Imagine a labyrinth where walls move every time the player moves making it impossible to calculate your way to the goal in advance so you'll have to improvise.

name: Haunted Hotel: Room 18 - Collector's Edition
description: A family reunion at the Sweet 18 hotel turns into a night of terror!

name: Ved
description: Ved is a story-driven, hand-drawn RPG with a unique turn-based combat system and roguelite elements. Set in two different worlds, VED tells the story of Cyrus, a young hero who sets out on a quest to become a master of sword and magic, and save everything he knows from destruction.

name: Listeria Wars
description: Listeria Wars is a tactical strategy where we protect the hero’s body from various infections and viruses by controlling the troops of the immune system. We can observe his personal life and even influence it with side effects.

name: Kamodo Steve! Janitor on Fire!
description: Kamodo Steve is an 2.5D action sidescroller where you play as Steve, an unwilling hero with unrealized power. Steve and his friend Shiloh team up to disrupt the sinister plans of the Robber Barons, a kabal of industrialists whose only motivations are success, power and greed.

name: 3 Blind Mice: A Remediation Game For Improper Children
description: A remediation game designed for last attempt corrections for particularly troubled youth. Failure to complete this game may result in removal from society. Please do not attempt to find the surveillance units. They are only present for monitoring your progress. Have a pleasant day.

name: Heavens Tournament
description: If you love anime, fighting and Virtual Reality or looking for a fun workout, then this is the game for you!

name: Through the Unknown
description: Through The Unknown is a 3D platformer where you try to survive deadly environments as a little jelly cube. Play through a courageous story mode and unlock new features for the level editor, where you can create your own courses to play.

name: Cirrata
description: Cirrata is a Metroidvania style indie video game about Keir, an anthropomorphic red panda who also happens to be a chef. The game is. inspired by the popular console games of the 90's. ​ Fight waves of enemies and improve your reputation in town to grow the town's pub.

name: Bundle Kitt
description: Enjoy Bundle Kitt; love Bundle Kitt. What sort of trouble will Bundle Kitt get into today?

name: Relivium
description: Relivium is a survival horror game set in a mysterious military archipelago plagued with soldiers infected by a once dormant aquatic parasite, and a haunting, mysterious presence... Set after the events of WW2, explore, manage your resources, and survive.

name: You are Pig Sitter
description: You need to plow the soil and grow up crops with poor land for live. make machine with doctor and use it ! you can make more efficient way to harvest! and one day make automatic everything!

name: Imperiums: Greek Wars
description: Imperiums: Greek Wars is a unique combination of turn-based 4X and historical grand strategy with a mythological twist. Explore the ancient world and open it up to your people. Survive, expand, conquer... and win!

name: Bonsai Castles
description: A tower defense game based on Japanese castles. Excavate the ground to create a moat, build walls and turrets, and fight off the enemies that attack you!

name: A Pirate's Pleasure
description: Sail the Caribbean Sea in this epic tale of true love, treasure, and intrigue. How will you navigate the changing tides? Only you can decide.

name: Blade Attack
description: After a lot of time polishing and great discussion with art, it was born. It is not only a game that requires your patience to study, it is more like my child, with that kind of emotion, going and You are strangers to meet, I hope that you can become good friends, and bring it together in this nervous, exciting and refreshing world!

name: Hide and Secret: The Lost World
description: Travel deep into the mysterious jungle of the Lost World! The nefarious treasure thief Jacques kidnapped damsel, and it’s up to you to stop his evil plans before she is sacrificed at the spooky full moon ritual.

name: Sanpo Suru Keyboard-tsukai
description: Yes, you will be "Typing Hero".

name: Escape from the Lostmoon
description: Cosmic pilot has lost his ship on the remote asteroid populated by disaster human colony, where outbreak of the unknown virus took place. Hungry zombies, villainous mercenaries and monsters are everywhere. Only you ... and his awesome arsenal could lead hero to freedom.

name: My Lucky Koi
description: Its`A humorous Daily story——A friendship story between a hard worker and a Koi leprechaun.——This is a Chinese short visual novel with single ending.

name: Magic of Autumn
description: Magic of Autumn is a singleplayer card game with an overworld - and everything in the overworld can be turned into cards.

name: Astro Puppa
description: Destroy all asteroids and your self esteem! Prove that you are not a Noob reaching the perfect score of 8888! 8===> A tough game for tough gamers!

name: Last Neighbor
description: You play as a young thief who broke into the wrong house, he thought the place was empty because he saw the owners leaving with suitcases, but there was still somebody in the house. It could be dangerous so you have to get out fast.

name: 探险与魔法
description: Sin descripción

name: FIT Food
description: FIT Food is a multiplayer card game. Have fun playing and learning about food at the same time. How do food items compare on healthiness, cost, and environmental impact? You probably know more than you think - but there will be surprises to you as well.

name: Cosmo story
description: Help the hero stop the invasion of enemy invaders, and save the universe from destruction.

name: Cross Border VR
description: "Cross Border VR" is a VR Shooting game. In the game, you need to eliminate the remaining forces of armed elements in the border areas and regain the treasure!

name: Warchasm
description: Battle hordes of murderous mechs as you hurtle through the canyons, chasms and caves of an alien world in a desperate bid for survival.

name: Whispered Secrets: Dreadful Beauty - Collector's Edition
description: Can you save your friend and escape from Acorn Hospital in time?

name: KuniTure
description: A game that looks pretty, but not easy

name: Blades of Gory
description: Blades of Gory is an easy to learn, hard to master, ultraviolent, 8 bit styled 2D fighting game. 8 warriors to choose from. 4 game modes. Arcade, versus, sudden death and 3 vs 3 tag team battle.

name: Cahertis
description:
Build your reputation with the people of Athara, maintain your gear, enchant it, and recruit companions to fight alongside you. Refine your talents in various masteries (fishing, lock picking, herbalism, pickpocketing…) and develop your combat skills in a turn-based strategy game called Cahertis.

In a medieval fantasy universe, play as Frey, a young recruit in a corrupt guard and investigate Antus. Recruit companions, rise in rank in the guard, and unravel the mysteries of Athara.

name: Choose for ME
description: Dive yourself in the Choose for ME universe and enter the reality of Mads Ever, a forgetful developer who will have to make his way through singular puzzles and some strange event due to his past...

name: Forest Ranger Simulator
description: Forests are flooded with rubbish! Let’s have a look at the valley you live in - entirely covered with them… It’s a high time you finally hunker down, grab a bin liner and lets your area challenge you - explore it and admire how the view is changing when you take care of it.

name: White Wings
description: "White Wings" uses the Japanese "e-mote" animation system. This is an agonizing wintertime love song. Broken families, Experiences of bullying, Tears concealed by smiles. Young men and women, three encounters, each carries sorrowful secrets in the cold winter. Embracing each other and absorbing the earth’s final, small bit of warmth.

name: CubeParkour
description: A simple parkour-platformer to have some fun and pass time. You are a cube and you have to get from point A to point B as creatively as possible. That's it. There are 100 levels at the moment.

name: Takkyu Tournament Re:Serve
description: This fantasy kung fu ping-pong mashup pays homage to classic retro arcade games while incorporating fighting game trappings like blocking, parrying, unique fighters, and special moves.

name: Stickman go
description: “Stickman go” is a puzzle game based on physics engine. In this game, player need to move stickman out of screen based on real physical phenomena. Sway, sway, sway. Don't stuck!

name: Klock
description: A fantasy adventure story featuring card battles (Trading Card Game in digital edition, only supporting Chinese now).

name: Myriad Tower Defense
description: Myriad TD is a tower defense strategy game. You build towers on a map of hexagons that will attack and defeat oncoming waves of enemies. Towers can be upgraded and some have varied upgrade paths. The goal is clear as many waves as possible. How far can you get?

name: Mega Balls
description: Mega Balls is a game of precision and persistence as you attempt to save your pal Good Boi! Navigate your ball through levels with unique layouts and obstacles all while being pulled down by the force of gravity.

name: Mira
description: Mira is a point and click adventure game about the magical journey of the titular heroine. From destroyed during world war II city of Cracow, she travels to a world of slavic myths and legends.

name: Unnamed Adventure
description: Unnamed Adventure, an indie action platformer where every single level, puzzle is crafted by hands. Wander around in a mysterious kingdom where surprise and finding may hide in every corner you visit.

name: The Zeta Orbital
description: The Zeta Orbital is a first-person exploration game. Explore an abandoned space station, hunting down clues to the crew's mysterious disappearance while scavenging the resources you need to survive and, just maybe, escape.

name: Death Park
description: Can you solve all the puzzles and escape from the scary clown in this horror game? It is already waiting for you!

name: The Adventures of Willow and Ash
description: The Adventures of Willow and ash is a platform adventure game, with a classic style and feel. You play as Willow, a young mage looking for your love ash who was taken from her. You will have to traverse obstetrical and slay monsters as you make your way through the world.

name: All Day Dying
description: A SINGLEPLAYER score attack game for quick sessions of focused adrenaline where you complete various goals without any story to get in the way.

name: Into the Maze
description: A giant maze like structure is discovered on Mars. You are a veteran astronaut sent with his team of researchers to unravel its secrets. Traverse the giant maze and solve its puzzles using a small drone with an arsenal of upgradeable abilities.

name: Mailbox
description: An arcade puzzle game for whole family! Drop the letter in the mailbox. Use the floor, buttons, teleports and moving platforms.

name: Catch the Ball 3
description: Catch the ball 3 is an awesome skillful brainteaser game. The game is originally the sequel of two popular web games Catch the ball 1 and 2. All you have to do is put the ball into the cup. Sounds easy, isn't? The way you do it is by creating lines that get the ball into the cup.

name: Kyle is Famous
description: Kyle tries to prepare for his most important interview yet. Choose his path through 21 endings and accept the consequences in this comedic adventure.

name: Robot Boy
description: Hi my name is RX-4, I am a robot, I can not control my body alone, try to help me go home please. Hmmmm ... I'm not going to hide it, I have no hope in you and I do not think you'll succeed. Already many people have tried to help me and have failed.

name: The Cruxis Sword
description: An extra-terrestrial parasite has infected the planet and is causing its energy to become polluted. Follow our heroes as they partake on a journey to rid the planet of the darkness before its too late.

name: Fateless
description: FPS game in which you defend Earth from monsters. You shoot the monsters with a double-barrel shotgun and other weapons and move through various buildings made of brick and stone. You make your way to the underground where the monsters came from and rid the planet of their presence.

name: Pumpkin Jack
description: Pumpkin Jack is a Spooky Scary 3D platformer in which you embody Jack, the Mythical Pumpkin Lord! Dive into an Epic Adventure through otherworldly landscapes and help the Evil annihilate the Good!

name: Consumed Awakening
description: Consumed Awakening is a strategic action game set in a dystopian future where mankind lives in a fading theocracy in the distant future among the stars.

name: Cats are Liquid: A Better Place
description: Cats are Liquid: A Better Place is a 2D platformer about a liquid cat and her friends. Over the course of the game, you get to explore 120 rooms and discover new abilities like the hookshot and light burst. You can also create your own worlds, and share them with others through the Steam Workshop.

name: Phoenix Tales
description: A hybrid adventure/RPG Something strange is happening in the land of Rydanthia. You arrive in the town of Northern Cross and quickly discover things are not what they seem. Can you solve the mysteries surrounding this threat? Can you live to tell the tale?

name: Incredible Dracula: Witches' Curse
description: Dracula has his undead hands full in this all-new adventure that pits him against a truculent trio of aging witches who will stop at nothing to restore their youth. Has Dracula met his match or can he save the day? The fate of all magic is in your hands!

name: Third Rule of Universe
description: Third Rule of Universe is a shoot'em up game with stylized visuals, a detailed story, dynamic gameplay, and fabulous music.

name: Pulstario
description: A small, challenging space game about collecting missing souls in the void.

name: InfiniteBeat
description: INFINITE BEAT is an entertaining game where you have the opportunity to test your reflexes by smashing Neon Beats with Laser Discs, which will magnetically return to your hands after firing. By using special abilities, the game gets more dynamic and you can earn much more points.

name: Displace
description: Single player, first-person puzzle game where you can spawn cubes and spheres while utilising switches, launch pads and boost pads to navigate through deceiving blocks to the next teleporter

name: Fullchoke
description: VR Clay Target Shooting.

name: Ether Loop
description: Ether Loop is a hardcore fast-paced bullet hell with roguelike elements. Descend the unforgiving depths of a mysterious world, encounter challenges, discover dynamic environments and fight ruthless creatures while unveiling the secrets of Ether Loop.

name: Thunder's Leaves
description: Thunder's Leaves is a modification about Combine technologies and their usage by rebels.

name: My Super Defender: Battle Santa Edition
description: My Super Defender is a fun arcade game in a fantasy New Year's setting for Santa Claus, who will have to save the new year in a small kingdom!

name: Glowcoma: Chapter 1
description: Glowcoma: Chapter 1 is a Sci-Fi FPS survivor horror game.

name: Creature Card Idle
description: Idler meets TCG! An incremental game where you place cards strategically on a grid to generate resources, and you spend those resources to purchase booster packs containing new cards.

name: Coffee Rush
description: The Smokestack Coffee Company is polluting the town with bad coffee and it`s up to you to open up your own coffee shop and take back the town! Swap coffee beans, milk, sugar and other tasty ingredients to prepare a menu full of tasty blends. Upgrade your shop, recipes, treats and bonuses. Need a jolt? Blast-off with Coffee Rush!

name: Classic Sudoku
description: Classic Sudoku is a sudoku puzzle game. The sudokus in the game cover a wide range of difficulty with something for everyone - and also require an incredible range of techniques to solve them efficiently! Players start with zero stars and earn stars by solving puzzles. The more puzzles you solve, the more stars you earn and the more puzzles you get to play.

name: Warrior Spirit
description: A 3D adventure video game for all ages. Use Warrior Spirit's many tools and abilities such as the Four Arms, Bracelets of Good, and Clay for platforming, combat, exploring, and solving puzzles. Travel through various lands and defeat Evil by serving the will and power of Perfect Good.

name: Bloodholic
description: The vampire who died was given the right to seek truth because of rebirth. As the identity changed, she changed from a victim to a criminal suspect... How can this be self-certified?

name: Cyberpunk Bar Sim
description:
This Cyberpunk-styled game is inspired by the gameplay of Game Dev Tycoon and the aesthetic of VA-11 HALL-A, sci-fi, and lo-fi city beats!

Own and manage a futuristic bar, meet quirky customers, market, and expand!

name: Chrono Ark
description: Chrono Ark is a party-based deck-building roguelike single player RPG game about rescuing the world from chaos. Recruit, train, and build a team of unique investigators throughout the abandoned land and restore the Twisted World!

name: Airhack
description: You are a secret Agent who begins work for the Airem as Hacker. Hacking servers of global corporations for profit, stealing data, manipulate the stock market, modify peoples academic or criminal records, laundering money, erasing evidence, framing innocent people. Do not trust anyone.

name: Strike Mole
description: This is a 3D casual hamster game with 12 levels. The first four levels are training levels, which are relatively simple, and the subsequent levels will require you to complete more in a shorter period of time as the level increases. Mole strikes, you need to destroy them in a short time to unlock more levels.

name: The Emerald Tablet
description: Enter the world of alchemy in the daily adventures of the money-hungry but good intentioned Misty, the arrogant adventure-seeking Gladys, and the explosive "expert" Winifred.

name: Aery VR
description: Aery VR is a peaceful virtual reality exploration game from the perspective of a little bird who decided to discover the world. Calm down from the hassle of your daily life, experience the feeling of flying and immerse into beautiful and atmospheric landscapes.

name: Pirates on Deck VR
description: Get on board and travel the seven seas. Enemy pirates and dangerous monsters are all over your ship! Don’t let anyone stand in your way. Shoot with your guns or battle with your cutlass. Master the cannons with your commands and crush enemy ships.

name: Neighbourhood Loot
description: THIEVES...Everywhere...But it's enough, No More, Time to take back YOUR Neighbourhood! Fight Back with all you have in this comedic, cartoonish themed strategic tower defence, created to give you hours of replayability and ridiculous mayhem. WELCOME to NEIGHBOURHOOD LOOT Good Citizen!

name: Dungeon Dreams (Female Protagonist)
description: Roguelike Romance JRPG with a female protagonist. Customize your characters, take open-ended quests and write your own story in the town of Ecallia. A game with town building, dating and life sim elements, but also a randomly generated Dungeon with lots of companions and loot!

name: Jian Wei Jun Wu
description: Love story with samurais living in Japan This is a splendid Japanese adventure game which its story is happened in "The Land of the Rising Sun" where human, Yōkai and Oni were living together.

name: Infinity Racer XD
description: Infinity Racer XD is designed to be a fast, simple to control and satisfying flight experience. Enjoy the simple and colorful atmosphere and master your reflexes. Infinity Racer XD fast, it's fun and it's awesome to kill time and to beat the high score.

name: Loga: Unexpected Adventure
description: A Classic fun beautiful platform game that is made to challenge you with more than 30 levels.

name: Exophobia
description: Explore and fight your way through a crashed human spaceship infested with relentless hordes of aliens as you become more powerful with exciting weapon upgrades and powerups in this retro inspired first-person shooter.

name: Door in the Woods
description: This game is a venture into an alternative timeline in which graphics and sensible game design were never invented.

name: Oil Mogul
description: Experience the oil intoxication and become a successful oil entrepreneur in the 19th century in North America. Manage price fluctuations and sell oil or kerosene. While you earn money by digging up and selling oil, the city will grow with you.

name: Lord of Sins
description: Sin descripción

name: Castle Commander
description: Pick attackers up and toss them into the air, moments later a satisfying squish as they hit the ground. Defend your castle from hoards of attacks. Upgrade your castle, land, and research with new defences & technology.

name: PLAYNE VR
description: Improve mental well-being, build resilience to stress, get calm and experience lasting relaxation. Playne is an immersive VR experience that teaches you meditation and helps you to build a daily habit of meditation. Playne is a game that grows with you.

name: Tales of Tomorrow: Experiment
description: ToT: Experiment is a sci-fi short story game set on a remote ship wandering through space. Without any memories or recollection of his past our hero is tasked by the ship AI - EVE to perform daily tasks, that will help to maintain the ship.

name: 觅长生
description: Sin descripción

name: The Walker
description: You will play reporter wood and police officer Ayer, trapped in the event caused by the mysterious drug in the rumor, find out the clues step by step in the illusion and reality, and finally work out the answers to uncover the darkness behind.

name: Miss Right?
description: This is A story about Miss Right. "TIangou" is a Chinese internet word. Means A man, who love a Girl, Give everything to the Gril,but GIrl do not accept him. Just like Miss Right, but your Miss right do not think you are Mr Right.

name: WASDead: Complete Edition
description: You're indie developer that stucked in your undone game. You don't understand why you here... In the digital world. But you trying to find exit and alive. But there is one problem... The exit cost the money.

name: Phantom Hills
description: As the Paranormal Detective, Hudson Black, you explore an isolated town, trying to uncover the dark secrets of anomalies. Will you survive? Will you help, join or destroy the unknown forces? It is up to you, Detective.

name: Arzt Simulator
description: Arzt Simulator - Nimm die Rolle eines Arztes ein und behandle erfolgreich Deine Patienten. Messe den Blutdruck, horche die Lunge ab, fertige Röntgenbilder an und vieles mehr. Stelle die richtige Diagnose und heile Deine Patienten mit der richtigen Therapie!

name: Crazy city
description: This is a first person shooter game,The player is in a city full of enemies.Players are free to explore the surrounding area, Health must be guaranteed by evading or killing enemies,Players can use their own weapons or rob enemy weapons.

name: Heebie Jeebies: The Roller Coaster
description: Heebie Jeebies is a horror roller coaster game created especially for VR. To survive the whole ride, you will have to hold the handles in front of you. If at any point you will release them - GAME OVER. This is the perfect game for you to experience something spooky and to scare your friends as well.

name: Epic Fun
description: Epic Fun is a collection of theme park-inspired attractions. You'll find a roller coasters with an exclusive rail shooting game, a free fall tower and a Hammer It game entirely for free.

name: After Gloom
description: A man enters the enigmatic Common Dream in search of a woman he once loved.

name: In the Service of Mrs. Claus
description: You’re the only elf who can save Christmas from the forces of darkness! Clash with cults, gods, and giant corporations to preserve Mrs. Claus's empire.

name: Inferna
description: Inferna is a player-friendly, free-to-play open-world MMORPG with unique combat system and a game world that sets no limits to the game experience.

name: A Long Stroll
description: The game that an old woman walks in a long straight road.

name: Gang District
description: Gang District is a local multiplayer shooter party game with a share screen mechanism. Pick up a weapon and start blasting and kick some tail!

name: Time Travel Trainer
description: It's time for time travel! Master the complexities of fourth dimensional thinking to succeed in this indie 2d puzzle game.

name: 烽火大秦
description: Sin descripción

name: VenusBlood Frontier International
description: Loki Muspelheim, an exiled member of demon nobility strives for the throne of the Dark Lord who has wronged him. To succeed the throne and exact his revenge, he must obtain the hidden treasure on the Floating Continent of Yggdrasil, protected by the goddesses of the seasons and their Chief God Odin.

name: Drawkanoid: Review Breaker
description: Smash through Steam reviews at hyperspeed, then guess which game they came from. Key resellers are bad for the industry, support developers directly!

name: Robin Hood: Country Heroes
description: Master archer Robin is at your disposal as you take on the Sheriff of Nottingham and his lackeys! You'll need a quick hand and an even quicker mind, but the reward of helping the downtrodden will make your mission worth every challenging step!

name: New York Mysteries: The Outbreak
description: “New York Mysteries: The Outbreak” is an adventure game in the genre of Hidden Objects with unforgettable characters and challenging quests to conquer, plenty of mini-games and puzzles!

name: Volleyball Fever Flat
description: Stick your feet in the sand and play beach volleyball on a tropical island. Volleyball Fever Flat is a sports game where you play 2v2 volleyball matches against computer-controlled opponents.

name: Scriptum VR: The Neighbor's House Escape Room
description: The Neighbor's House is the latest game of the Scriptum saga. Play this Virtual Reality Escape room and feel the tension around every corner. Will you be able to get out on time?

name: The Adventures of Looppy
description: Immerse yourself in the magical world of adventure and puzzles with Looppy!

name: Hero Soul: I Want to be a Hero!
description: Learn what it means to be a hero in this classically inspired JRPG! Help Cecilia Grey follow in her father's footsteps to become a respected adventurer.

name: Legend of the 9 Swords: Side Story
description: Legend of the 9 Swords: Side Story is a 2-Dimensional illustrated narrative role-playing game that is hand animated to give every hero and enemy there own style and feel.

name: Defend Them !
description: Defend Them ! is a fictionally ironic tower defense game about killing enemies and defending human infrastructure.

name: Pick Your Poison
description: Pick a disadvantage each level, how far can you go in this roguelike?

name: Royal Detective: The Last Charm - Collector's Edition
description: Can you rescue your daughter and save both realms in time?

name: TriangleStorm
description: TriangleStorm is a simple and challenging side-scroller game where you change the gravity on command and avoid the storm of triangles.

name: Private Investigator Simulator
description: Assume the role of a modern detective and solve fascinating cases using lots of gadgets and your own skills. Let a sophisticated narrative help you uncover clues and secrets that might not be apparent right away and become a star detective.

name: Psihanul
description: PSIHANUL- you will take revenge on the bosses and colleagues for the fact that you were fired, shoot and break everything around you, do not leave anything behind you, destroy this office and no one will help you in this, so good luck and don't freak out.

name: The Delirium Vacation
description: The Delirium Vacation is a surreal first person puzzle game from Ex Conspectu. Delve deep into the expanse of your own mind and experience the internal war between your inner Demons and your inner...hedgehogs.

name: Death to the Dragon Lord
description: For over a millennia the land of Aforn has been under the tyrannical rule of the Dragon Lord. All attempts to overthrow him have led to near genocide, but the Dragon Lord's cruelty is so great that despite the consequences another revolt is brewing.

name: Puzzle Patrol
description: Puzzle Patrol is a unique and modern spin on the falling blocks arcade puzzler, inspired by classics like Tetris, Puyo Puyo, and Puzzle League.

name: Pixels can fight
description: Pixels can fight is an adventure of 4 friends in a physics-based pixel world. Fight each other in arenas.

name: Project Apocalypse
description: Build a post-apocalyptic city and protect it from the infected. Survive.

name: Output Pasture
description: Output Pasture is a fast-paced Tower Defense Game which combines the elements of roguelike. Unlock, combine unique animals to battle together, and fight the evil Machine Legion.

name: Ghouls Underground
description: A gigantic Shoot-em-up/metroidvania.

name: Wolfthorn
description: Sin descripción

name: Occultus Command
description: It is the year 3260, a cosmic storm named Father's Wrath threatens to end life on Earth's upper layer. The surest way to survive Father's Wrath is to escape underground to a world called Occultus. Information on the incoming storm and Occultus is encrypted, hidden and monitored.

name: Ten Thousand Coins: The Golden Merchant
description: Ten Thousand Coins: The Golden Merchant is a story-driven merchant adventure that will test your sense of strategy and empathy as you make tough decisions for a fox merchant girl aiming to save the life of a loved one.

name: Ball Pit Simulator
description: YOU ARE TRAPPED IN A CURSED BALL PIT, HOW WILL YOU ESCAPE? Ball Pit Simulator is the first game to take place entirely in the realms of a ball pit however, it is not all fun and games. There is only one rule in the ball pit, don't touch the green balls!

name: Nebuchadnezzar
description: Nebuchadnezzar is a classic isometric city builder game inviting players to experience the mysterious history and culture of ancient Mesopotamia. In the campaign, players get to rule over influential historical cities filled with magnificent monuments.

name: Quantumleaper
description:
In Quantumleaper, you'll use your Superposition ability to solve puzzles that would be otherwise impossible to complete. Duplicate your position with a single button and press it again to switch between your two selves at any time, no matter how far.
You can use your other self to activate switches, mislead enemies and block projectiles. Sometimes, even tunnel through walls. As you progress, new components will require you to find new ways to advance – using both intelligence and skill. It's a huge maze filled with deadly puzzles.

name: Master of Pottery
description: Master of Pottery is a pottery-themed creation + simulation game. Create unique works and run your own exhibition hall.

name: Paul's World
description: Paul's World is an Old-School RPG game. We designed this game for mini rpg & survival fans. Farming, crafting, combat, fishing, mini games and more, just explore it! Monsters, wild animals, aliens... Who do you think will win?

name: Mr Zig
description: Do whatever a Zig can with Mr Zig, a adventure game where you must traverse a strange, warped and rotting world littered with succulent meats and techno medicine ripe for the picking.

name: Survived
description: The core of the game is to shoot, decrypt and explore as a whole. By finding clues to trigger the main storyline and enhance the players'sense of entrance, the players will constantly excavate the truth throughout the game. The fascinating story and the unimaginable horror are waiting for you.

name: Vaporum: Lockdown
description: Vaporum: Lockdown, a prequel to Vaporum, is a grid-based dungeon crawler RPG in an original steampunk setting, inspired by old-school classics of the genre. Follow the story of Lisa Teller, a scientist struggling to survive disastrous events that happened in the tower of Arx Vaporum.

name: The Legend of Dark Witch Renovation
description:
The Legend of Dark Witch is a 2D platform action game. Zizou can learn new attacks by defeating bosses. She will need every one of those attacks if she is going to save the world.

Updates in Renovation include:
- New character illustrations and revamp pixel art spites to high-resolution
- New Animations
- Added the minigames "Avoid Runner" and "Breakers"
- New Boss arrangements to change attack patterns
- Added Capacity System from Ep2
& more!

name: Iron Blood VR
description: Iron Blood VR is a sci-fi team shooter with various characters. Each character possesses unique weapons and skills. All the characters are able to communicate by teleporting to their allies, which makes the game insanely dynamic. By the way, teleportation beam is lethal to enemies.

name: Boot Camp Fitness
description: Boot Camp Fitness is a cardio and bodyweight fitness game, focused on helping you become the fittest, leanest version of yourself. Including over 200 exercise variations and a 100+ song playlist. With 13 ranks and 18 exercise locations to unlock. No exercise equipment needed.

name: Raiohgar: Asuka and the King of Steel
description: Having cornered the evil organization Trizon, our hero Kouta and his partner Asuka move to the remote island of Okikeshima with their trusted super robot RaiOhGar to prepare for a fierce battle against Trizon. However, all is not quite as it seems.

name: The Looter
description: The Looter is 2D, action/adventure, pixel art, postapocalyptic indie game.

name: Time Fragments: 24h in Capua
description: Time Fragments: 24h in Capua is an adventure RPG game set in 73 BC during the famous slave rebellion in Capua lead by the infamous Thracian soldier Spartacus. You have 24h to find your missing friends.

name: Card Hog
description: Card-based dungeon crawler with pigs, boss fights and all kinds of adventures! Free demo with full content available!

name: SuperEpic: The Entertainment War
description: Join a raccoon and a llama in their quest to save videogames as we know them! SuperEpic is a Metroidvania style action-adventure game filled with humour and satire. The gameplay is nonlinear and fast-paced, with exploration and combo-based combat being the weapon of choice against the evil RegnantCorp!

name: Iron Sun
description: Hardcore and old-school, grim, dark sci-fi first person shooter.

name: Disc Golf Adventure VR
description: Disc Golf in VR for when you can't (or don't want to) play outside!

name: Killer Gin
description: Classic Epic Fantasy Adventure - A JRPG with optional dating and farming mechanics

name: Misc Timelines
description: Drag and drop the historic events cards onto the timeline, arranging them from earliest to latest. Put all the events in correct chronological order to beat the level and unlock the next challenge.

name: Team Switch VR: Experts Burglary Agency
description: Team Switch is a virtual reality asynchronus co-op game, you are a robber assisted by your team, who can send you instructions to help you with a manual.

name: Skin Witch
description: Skin Witch is a true survival horror game, focused on managing limited resources, puzzles, and non-linear gameplay. Trapped in an underground mine you were sent to investigate, you soon learn you’re not alone. In the deep dark, depraved beasts stalk... and hunger.

name: Legend of Everything
description: A mind-bending isekai other-world science adventure! On a quest to rescue the Princess from the Demon Lord, Brane encounters an eccentric young woman claiming to be from another world—one with “RPGs” and “video games”!? Epic battles, loveable heroines, and real scientific theory!

name: The Strange Story of Brian Fisher: Chapter 1
description: This is the story of detective Brian Fisher who after the disappearance of his father, makes his life mission to find him...alive! His father is a scientist and disappeared under suspicious circumstances. Brian is eager to find his father and devotes his life to find out why and how he disappeared, with his only hope to find him alive.

name: Gods of Love: An Otome Visual Novel
description: The healer Thalia has developed magical powers and the gods of her world think she might be a new goddess they can marry. Poor Thalia just wants to do her work!

name: Unlit
description: A slow-paced point-and-click adventure game without language. With original soundtrack, personally crafted models and textures and brilliant voice-acting, Unlit is completely a one-of-a-kind experience.

name: High School Otome
description: Sabrina is your average teenager. However she has a troubled relationship with her grandmother, who is her only family guardian after her parents died in a car accident. Things only get worse when Sabrina hears the devastating news that her Grandmother has cancer.

name: Artificial Extinction
description: You have 9 days to find a safe place on the planet. Your ship is low on fuel and you have to land. Setup sentry guns around you to defend yourself while you collect more fuel for the ship. AI controlled Drones and Tanks attack you trying to find weaknesses in your defenses.

name: Grand Academy II: Attack of the Sequel
description: Seize your destiny and vanquish your rivals at the world's finest evil preparatory school! The whole gang is back for a deliciously meta sequel.

name: Death and Taxes
description: In this 2D, narrative-based game, you assume the role of the Grim Reaper... on an office job. Your job is to decide which people are going to live or die. The consequences of your choices are yours to bear, while the mystery of your incarnation awaits revelation!

name: Road to Nowhere
description: Road To Nowhere tells the story of Cohle Bishop, an introvert and successful software developer whose life is torn to shreds by scandal. Confronted by his past and doubting his own sanity, he spirals into a depression on the open road, trying desperately to pull himself back from the brink.

name: Babel Climbers
description: A round-robin Roguelike game, with a lively rhythm and unique flavor. You were born in a tower, with a mission, climbing one level at a time of adventure, and like other climbers, you want to find the level of heaven. However, this is a bizarre world, which is an adventure that can not be turned back.

name: Natural Instincts
description: Protect the environment, and save it from harm! Give commands to the animals, observe their rituals and help them survive. Face different disasters, react to human presence and help the animal kingdom flourish in this unique, environmental experience!

name: Fairytale Mosaics: Beauty and Beast
description: Solve 120 enchanted mosaics! Bring the prince and kingdom back to normal before the final enchanted rose petal falls!

name: Mystery Solitaire: Arkham's Spirits
description: Solve the most mystical layouts you've ever seen!

name: Piping Hot
description: Your classic pipe-connecting game, turned up to 11! Switch between floors of pipes as you race against the flowing water to get to the end! Play in Unlimited mode for never-ending pipe-connecting fun!

name: Shades of Heroes
description:
With the world descending into chaos... will you protect the light?... or consume it?...
Choose your side... Good or Evil!

name: Dimensionality 3.5
description: Each of us is a celestial body in the vast universe. When our hero is on a common track in his life, this track takes him to another dimension.

name: Dairy Princess
description: その名作の『ラクノープリンセス』はいよいよSteamに登場しました！『ラクノープリンセス』は酪農シミュレーションゲームです。プレイヤーは街外れの牧場を経営する女の子となります。
